name: Desert Bomb
description:
Drive in real-time (six hours) from San Francisco to E3 20XX with the (randomly generated) Giant Bomb crew. Each trip from SF to E3 (or vice-versa) earns you one point.

Best played on controller, supports keyboard + mouse.

ControllerKeyboardAccelerateRight TriggerWBrake / ReverseLeft TriggerSLeftLeft on Left ThumbstickARightRight on Left ThumbstickDVolume UpRotate right stick clockwiseMousewheel UpVolume DownRotate right stick anti-clockwiseMousewheel Down

Conceived of for Giant Rom 6, a jam that hasn't come to pass, I've been plugging away at this bus-like here and there for a few months. Apologies for the programmer art.

Twitter: @abneyonline
